name: Crimson Guard
description: A cuirass originally built to protect against the dreaded Year Beast.

abilities.name: Guard
abilities.description: Grants nearby allied heroes and buildings a guaranteed chance to block a fixed portion of physical attack damage, plus a portion based on the caster's max health.
notes: Interrupts the caster's channeling abilities upon cast
Affects allied heroes, including illusions and buildings, invulnerable and hidden units
Does not affect units that have been affected by Guard in the last 39 seconds
Guard has an ensured Damage Block
When multiple different sources proc on the same attack, the one with a higher value takes priority
Does not work against damage from wards sources
Does not reduce physical damage from abilities, except for specific abilities

abilities.name: Damage Block
abilities.description: Grants the wielder a chance to block a fixed portion of physical attack damage.
notes: When multiple different sources proc on the same attack, the one with a higher value takes priority
Multiple sources of the same value stack multiplicatively
Does not work against damage from wards sources
Does not reduce physical damage from abilities, except for specific abilities
Ranged wielders block less damage with the same proc chance

additionalInfo: This item is shown as a Team Item in the shop window when purchased by an ally
The proc chances of all sources of Damage Block work independently from each other
When multiple sources of Damage Block proc on the same attack, only the one with the highest blocked damage value takes effect
